com.asdf.ssjava.screens
Class LevelCreatorScreen

java.lang.Object
  com.asdf.ssjava.screens.LevelCreatorScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class LevelCreatorScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

The level creation screen. Allows the placement of all game entities in the world. Camera moves to place entities throughout the world.

Author:
Jeremy Brown, Simon Thompson
